definition: Bernanke (name)/Ben Shalom Bernanke (1953-), US economist, Chairman of Fed from 2006
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
variant of 克[ke4]/to subdue/to overthrow/to restrain
Ke (c. 2000 BC), seventh of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
abbr. for 克羅地亞|克罗地亚[Ke4 luo2 di4 ya4], Croatia/(Tw) abbr. for 克羅埃西亞|克罗埃西亚[Ke4 luo2 ai1 xi1 ya4], Croatia

sentences.english: Hypocrisy is also at play in how Bernanke and his Chinese counterparts are embroiled in a race to the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 伯南克与其中国对手的竞次之争不也是一种虚伪么。

sentences.english: Critics have come out on all sides of Bernanke's highly accommodative monetary policy.
sentences.chinese: 伯南克高度宽松的货币政策已然被批评地体无完肤。

sentences.english: The trouble is that Bernanke’s stimulus spending was a blunderbuss.
sentences.chinese: 麻烦在于伯南克推行消费刺激政策实乃草率之举。

sentences.english: That highlights the danger in Mr Bernanke's new strategy.
sentences.chinese: 这一点凸显了伯南克新招中的一种危险。

sentences.english: By contrast, the Fed's response under Mr. Bernanke is entirely proactive.
sentences.chinese: 相形之下，伯南克先生的应对措施更为积极。

sentences.english: Bernanke is scheduled to testify tomorrow before the House Financial Services Committee.
sentences.chinese: 伯南克定于明天向众议院金融服务委员会作证。

sentences.english: Why don’t I expect much from Mr. Bernanke?
sentences.chinese: 为什么我对伯南克先生不报很大期望？

sentences.english: Mr. Bernanke, how do you respond?
sentences.chinese: 伯南克先生，你将会如何作答呢？

sentences.english: Ben Bernanke, the Fed’s chairman, has also felt congressional anger in recent days.
sentences.chinese: 美联储主席伯南克在近几天同样感受到国会的压力。

sentences.english: Bernanke and his Fed colleagues have cut their forecasts for growth this year.
sentences.chinese: 伯南克和美联储官员已经降低了今年经济增长预期。

sentences.english: The senate will now only to confirm Bernanke for his second four-year term.
sentences.chinese: 现在，仅需参议院确认伯南克第二个四年的任期。

sentences.english: But Bernanke said there is no choice in this case.
sentences.chinese: 但是伯南克说，在这件事上别无选择。

sentences.english: Bernanke is likely to buy tranches of Treasuries quarterly, spread out over a year.
sentences.chinese: 伯南克近期有可能买入大笔已放出超过一年的国债。

definition: Geithner (name)/Timothy Geithner (1961-), US banker, Treasury Secretary from 2009
Paulson or Powellson (name)/Henry (Hank) Paulson (1946-), US banker, US Treasury Secretary from 2006
US Federal Reserve (Fed), the US central bank
subprime mortgage crisis/abbr. for 次級房屋信貸危機|次级房屋信贷危机[ci4 ji2 fang2 wu1 xin4 dai4 wei1 ji1]
dove faction (opposite: 鹰派, hawks)/peace party/the faction seeking peace
Clinton (name)/Bill Clinton (1946-), US Democratic politician, President 1993-2001/Hillary Rodham Clinton (1947-), US Democratic politician

pinyin: Ou1 zhou1 Zhong1 yang1 Yin2 hang2
